feed.title: Your Spotify Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Your Spotify: 1.9.0
entry.content:
[!WARNING] Setting CORS environment variable to all is not supported anymore. By default the only the CLIENT_ENDPOINT is authorized as an origin. If you want to allow all origins (which is enough in most cases), please follow the CORS readme section.

Bug fixes

  • Many security fixes, again thanks @RagingCactus
  • Respect COOKIE_VALIDITY_MS setting in production by @RagingCactus in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/365

Miscellaneous

  • Sider design rework by @quentinguidee in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/360
  • Allow GETing /version without being logged by @bloedboemmel in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/367

New Contributors

  • @RagingCactus made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/365
  • @bloedboemmel made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/367

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/compare/1.8.1...1.9.0

entry.title: New release for Your Spotify: 1.9.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

  • Fixed subdomains having an underscore in their name in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/373

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/compare/1.9.0...1.9.1

entry.title: New release for Your Spotify: 1.10.0
entry.content:
Features

  • You can now use localized dates for stats in YourSpotify. By default, it will follow the browser date format. If you want a different format than the browser, you can go in the Settings page, under statistics, and choose a specific language to display the date in, in #377. Fixes #219 #376 #322.

Miscellaneous

  • You can display YourSpotify in an iframe by setting the FRAME_ANCESTOR environment variable accordingly #375.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/compare/1.9.1...1.10.0

entry.title: New release for Your Spotify: 1.10.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

  • Fixed not being able to create a user in #382

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/compare/1.10.0...1.10.1

entry.title: New release for Your Spotify: 1.11.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Allow to display ranking using either Count or Duration @Blackcheckgamer in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/395
  • Allow to delete public token so that no url can access your account #409

Bug fixes

  • Fixed not being able to visit a public token while logged in #334
  • Fixed file names not being visible in dark mode by @M2K3K5 #420 üòè

Miscellaneous

  • Set use-credentials for manifest file by @aseevlx in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/397
  • Add dedicated frontend error page when API_ENDPOINT points to the frontend by @RagingCactus in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/404
  • Make sure Mongo restarts by @mtthidoteu in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/425
  • Fixed some minor typos in various files; fixed CORS verbiage by @kmanwar89 in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/402

New Contributors

  • @Blackcheckgamer made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/395
  • @aseevlx made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/397
  • @kmanwar89 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/402
  • @mtthidoteu made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/425
  • @M2K3K5 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/423

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/compare/1.10.1...1.11.0
